prompt: Text Prompt: "Create an image of a close-up fabric texture featuring a Scandinavian style geometric pattern with intricate stitching details. The pattern consists of diamond shapes and a series of curved lines, suggesting a modern take on traditional weaving techniques. The color palette is muted with shades of gray, beige, and white, evoking a sense of minimalism and simplicity, which are characteristic elements of Scandinavian design."
